track.name: Try a Little Tenderness
comments: @ fancykatya, Michale made this song so soft and romantic.  How can you even compare the two.  Enjoy each one for it's own style.  When I want some hard hitting RnB, I will listen to Otis, when I want some soft romance, I will listen to Michael.   This version  is so beautiful.  Thank you Michael Buble'
No offence to MB but nobody should be doin this song but Otis Redding, I won't ban it since when I hear it I'll think of Otis and his far superior version~
♥ Obrigada meu bem. Adoro Michael Bublé e adoro você .♥
Just in my opinion , It is the best "Try a little tenderness" ever !
Someone has to replace Sinatra and it may as well be Buble'!!!!
delicia de música...um convite para dançar numa noite de luar e se perder no tempo e no espaço!!!
